title: 3D Vector Addition
description:
DEC_TO_BYTE converts a decimal encoded string into a byte
value. Here only decimal characters '0 '.. '9' are interpreted, others in DEC
occurring characters are ignored .
name: V3_ADD

input.name: A
input.description: The first input vector for the addition operation.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The X component of the vector A.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The Y component of the vector A.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The Z component of the vector A.

input.name: B
input.description: The second input vector for the addition operation.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The X component of the vector B.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The Y component of the vector B.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The Z component of the vector B.

output.name: V3_ADD
output.description: The resultant vector from the addition of vectors A and B.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The X component of the resultant vector.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The Y component of the resultant vector.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The Z component of the resultant vector.

return_value.description: The function does not return a value, but modifies the output parameter V3_ADD.
